profile.name: Affan Bin Nishat
profile.title: Data Scientist & Researcher
profile.tagline: Exploring the intersection of Topological Data Analysis and Deep Learning.

about.title: About
about.content: I research robust geometric representations for unstructured data. My work focuses on scalable algorithms for persistent homology and their application to neural network interpretability. I am currently pursuing my research goals in data science.

projects.title: TDA-Net
projects.description: A PyTorch library for integrating topological features into graph neural networks. Achieved state-of-the-art results on molecular property prediction benchmarks.

projects.title: Manifold-Vis
projects.description: Interactive visualization tool for high-dimensional manifold learning. Uses WebGL for real-time rendering of millions of data points.

projects.title: Sparse-Attention
projects.description: Optimized implementation of sparse attention mechanisms for long-context Transformers, reducing memory footprint by 40%.
